casebody.data:
No. 10-963. Progressive Casualty Insurance Company, Petitioner v. Estate of Jose Juan Palomera-Ruiz, Deceased, et al. 563 U.S. 974, 131 S. Ct. 2874,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1187,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3475. May 2, 2011.

Petition for writ of certio-rari to the Court of Appeals of Arizona, Division One, denied.

*1188Same case below, 224 Ariz. 380, 231 P.3d 384.
